name: Polenta With Parmesan and Tomato Sauce
description: This is my favorite way to serve polenta, and it’s the simplest, too. My son loves it -- maybe your kids will feel the same.
keywords: gluten-free, halal, healthy, kosher, low cholesterol, nut-free, vegetarian, main course, parmesan, polenta, tomato sauce
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup freshly grated Parmesan optional, plus additional for sprinkling
1 1/2 cups Fresh Tomato Sauce or Simple Marinara Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Combine the polenta, water and salt in a 2-quart baking dish. Stir together, and place in the oven. Bake 50 minutes. Remove from the oven, stir in the butter and return to the oven for 10 more minutes. Remove from the oven and stir again. Return to the oven for 10 minutes. Remove from the oven, and stir in the Parmesan, if using. Spoon onto plates, make a depression in the middle and spoon 1/4 heaped cup of simple tomato sauce into the depression. Sprinkle with Parmesan and serve.
